name: Ancient OG
description: Ancient OG from Bodhi Seeds is a mostly indica strain descended from an Iranian landrace and Snow Lotus. Its thickly resinous buds exude aromatic notes of earthy pine and sweet citrus that are fully realized in Ancient OG’s taste. This high-yielding indica is best suited for sea of green gardens and has a 70 day flowering time. Outdoor cultivators should prepare for harvest in the month of October.
descriptionPlain: Ancient OG from Bodhi Seeds is a mostly indica strain descended from an Iranian landrace and Snow Lotus. Its thickly resinous buds exude aromatic notes of earthy pine and sweet citrus that are fully realized in Ancient OG’s taste. This high-yielding indica is best suited for sea of green gardens and has a 70 day flowering time. Outdoor cultivators should prepare for harvest in the month of October.

highlightedReviews.text: I had the pleasure of smoking some Ancient Og and fell in love with this strain instantly.. The flavor and high were off the charts! It has a very trippy mild psychadelic edge to the high which I attribute to one half of this strain being of landrace iranian genetics. I personally would just call this strain the ancient because it just isn't og kushy or plain old kushy at all. It has great bag appeal and trich coverage sweet lemon slightly tropical flavor and a great high. I highly reccomend trying this strain.

If you like indica this is the door to open ( also called emperor OG sometimes) it has an amazing flavor the body effect is just perfect for that after work night time smoke. This is it my number 3 go to strain for sleep and relaxation and that’s saying a lot!!! This stuff rocks!

articles.title: New Strains: Ancient OG, Appalachia, Lucky Charms, Mother's Finest, and Sunshine Daydream
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Many of this week’s new strains come at the request of our users, and Leafly strives to target the varieties that are available to you. If you feel that we missed any, let us know! 
Ancient OG and Sunshine Daydream are our new indicas from Bodhi Seeds, and from Sensi Seeds we’ve added their energizing sativa, Mother’s Finest. Looking for something in between? Appalachia and Lucky Charms are the hybrids you’ll want to look out for. If you manage to locate any of these new strains, help our your fellow cannabis enthusiasts by rating and reviewing!
1. Ancient OG
Characteristics of Ancient OG:

Mostly indica strain 
Cross between an Iranian landrace strain and Snow Lotus
Breeder: Bodhi Seeds
Earthy pine and sweet citrus aroma
Indoor flowering time of 70 days; October harvest outdoors

2. Appalachia
Characteristics of Appalachia:

Hybrid strain
Cross between Green Crack and Tres Dawg
Breeder: High & Lonesome Seeds
Earthy pine and subtle fruit aroma
Dreamy and yet functional cerebral buzz paired with relaxing full-body effects
Improves appetite and dulls pain

3. Lucky Charms
Characteristics of Lucky Charms:

50/50 hybrid strain
Cross between The White and Appalachia
Tangy fruit aroma
Indoor flowering time of 9 weeks

4. Mother’s Finest
Characteristics of Mother’s Finest:

70% sativa strain
Heavy Haze genetics
Breeder: Sensi Seeds
Sweet, tangy, earthy aroma
Energetic sativa buzz
Indoor flowering time of 7 to 10 weeks; outdoor harvest at the end of October

5. Sunshine Daydream
Characteristics of Sunshine Daydream:

Indica-dominant strain
Cross between Appalachia and Bubbashine
Breeder: Bodhi Seeds  
Tangy diesel, fruit, and berry flavors
May help pain, nausea, and inflammation
